plausible_answers.text: sciences, arts, politics, literatures and business.

qas.question: In which fields have Christians failed to make contributions?
How many Nobel Prize laureates between 1901 and 2000 identify as politics?
According to a review of the sciences, how many Nobel Prize winners identify as Christian?
Christians have made contributions to science and art but not which subjects?

context: Christians have made a myriad contributions in a broad and diverse range of fields, including the <b0_0>sciences, arts, <b3_0>politics, literatures and business<b3_0/>.<b0_0/> According to 100 Years of Nobel Prizes, a review of Nobel prizes awarded between 1901 and 2000 reveals that (<b1_0><b2_0>65.4%<b2_0/><b1_0/>) of Nobel Prizes laureates identified Christianity in its various forms as their religious preference.
